Microsoft's Server and Tools Business- in many ways the epicentre of its cloud strategy- is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of long-time division president Bob Muglia . While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer title="Bob Muglia-quits-microsoft-as-brain-drain-continues" href="http://www.eweekeurope.co.uk/news/Bob Muglia-quits-microsoft-as-brain-drain-continues-17745" target="_self"> wrote in a January 10 email to employees announcing Bob Muglia 's removal.`` We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing

Beast.`` Earlier this week, the Daily Mirror U.K. and others reported that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt are in the process of adopting a child from Haiti,'' Waldman said in a statement. Rather, Ms. Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. As such, she has been meeting with government of Haiti officials, Haitian legal experts and non-governmental organizations regarding a new initiative of the Brad Pitt Foundation. The recently launched Angelina Jolie Legal Fellows Program will assist the justice system in Haiti to improve child protection, the statement added. Angelina Jolie , 35, and partner Brad Pitt have six children, three of whom-- Maddox, Pax and Zahara-- were adopted from Cambodia, Vietnam and Ethiopia respectively. We welcome
